DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Protocol Therapeutic Procedure Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the name of an action or administration of therapeutic agents, as part of the guidelines of a clinical study,  to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Trial Protocol Therapeutic Procedure Identifier
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the name or identifier of an action or administration of therapeutic agents, as part of the guidelines of a clinical study,  to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action plan for a clinical trial.  The plan states what the study will do, how, and why.  It explains how many people will be in it, who is eligible to participate, what study agents or other interventions they will be given, what tests they will receive and how often, and what information will be gathered.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: A formal document that describes a complete plan of research activity in the framework of a clinical study; specifically, the study objective(s), design, methodology, eligibility requests for prospective subjects and controls; intervention regimen(s), proposed methods of analysis of data; statistical considerations, and organization of the study. The protocol usually also provides the background and rationale for the study, but these could be represented in other protocol referenced documents.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the name of the type of therapy.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The words or language units by which a thing is known.

Concepts.definition: The words or language units by which a thing is known.

DataElement.origin: SWOG CRF:Southwest Oncology Group Case Report Form
